item.title: Debt-Laden Tullow Holds Refinancing Talks With Bondholders
item.description: Tullow Oil Plc is in talks with its bondholders about refinancing a nearly $1.3 billion bond due next year, as the imminent maturity adds to pressure on the Africa-focused oil explorer.

item.title: Debt-Laden Tullow Holds Refinancing Talks With Bondholders
item.description: Tullow Oil Plc is in talks with its bondholders about refinancing a nearly $1.3 billion bond due next year, as the imminent maturity adds to pressure on the Africa-focused oil explorer.
